idea:
REINFORCE STEEL & NICKEL ALLOYS (AN ISO 9001:2015. Certified Company)

WE ARE STOCKIST ,MANUFACTURER AND SUPPLIER  OF PIPE FITTINGS,FLANGES  FASTENERS AND RAW MATERIAL  IN BELOW MENTION GRADES. 


HIGH NICKEL ALLOYS

Hastelloy C276/C22/C4/C2000/B2/B3    

Monel 400,K500,  Nickel 200/201  

Inconel 625,600,601,825,800,800H,718,925

Titanium Gr.2,5,7

Alloy20, Alloy286,17-4PH

Duplex 31803/2205,  Super Duplex 32750/32760  

Nitronic, Nimonic Alloy 80,SMO 254, 904L

STAINLESS STEEL  - 304/304L/316/316L/316Ti/321/347/317L/308/309/310/904L/410/420/440C/416

Carbon Steel,Mild Steel,Alloy Steel,Etc.


 All the products will be available in different shapes & sizes. Products mention below:

Socket weld fittings , Ferrule , Butt-weld fittings , Flanges , Fasteners, Wire ,ROUND,SQUARE,HEX BAR ,PIPE & TUBE, SHEET & PLATE, FLAT,ANGLE,CHANNEL,Strips , etc.

Among this product we are into Manufacturing of :

Butt weld fittings Socket weld fittings Ferrule Fittings Flanges & Fasteners.


        We are also supplying the materials to various departments. Public and private sectors, chemicals plants,Oil And Gas Industry , Pharmaceutical all our country and enjoying their confidence by supplying genuine materials.


we will be extremely happy to serve you with our vast range of products . We supply in user defined Sizes.
